definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: He says the money helps to persuade drug makers to take part in the project.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這筆錢可以幫助說服制藥商參與該項目。

pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
to make an irrelevant comparison or interpretation (idiom)
interactions between heaven and mankind (Han Dynasty doctrine)
to shoot without aim (idiom); fig. to speak without thinking/firing blindly/to shoot in the air/a shot in the dark
treatment involving the use of tonics to restore the patient's health/reinforcing method (in acupuncture)
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
it will cause no end of trouble (idiom)
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
